snippet: Ms. Yellen’s remarks are the latest indication that officials think the economy has shaken off a slow start to 2015 and will grow in spite of trouble abroad.
abstract: Federal Reserve Chairwoman Janet L Yellen says she thinks Fed will raise its benchmark interest rate later in 2015 as economy gets stronger.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Yellen’s remarks are the latest indication that officials think the economy has shaken off a slow start to 2015 and will grow in spite of trouble abroad.

headline.main: Yellen Expects Fed to Raise Rates This Year
headline.print_headline: Yellen Sees Fed Raising Rates in ’15
